<div id="sheet-data"></div>

<script>
    async function fetchSheetData() {
        const url = 'https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/e/2PACX-1vSMongDgzsyxPpmkcU2OrGn2ktM07LqK9qqSWct6rwIOxLKr_5AQ9_jwzBNIapiXdVdtTSqb3q3bcE2/pub?output=csv'; 
        
        const response = await fetch(url);
        const data = await response.text();
        const rows = data.split('\n');
        let html = '<ul>';

        // Example: Print specific cells from the sheet
        if (rows.length > 2) {
            const cells1 = rows[2].split(','); // Get third row
            const singleCellValue1 = cells1[1]; // Get second cell from third row
            html += '<li>' + singleCellValue1 + '</li>'; // Add it to the list

            const cells2 = rows[3].split(','); // Get fourth row
            const singleCellValue2 = cells2[1]; // Get second cell from fourth row
            html += '<li>' + singleCellValue2 + '</li>'; // Add it to the list
        }

        html += '</ul>';
        document.getElementById('sheet-data').innerHTML = html; // Print the HTML for the first part

        // Now append something else specific
        const additionalContent = "<p>This is some additional content after the list.</p>";
        document.getElementById('sheet-data').innerHTML += additionalContent; // Append additional content
    }

    fetchSheetData(); // Call the function to fetch data
</script>
